com.codecool.shop.model

Class Cart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.model.Cart

  • public class Cart
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a cart. A cart contains a list of lineItem-s which contain the ordered products, their quantities and price. The instance also contains a reference to the customer.
    Since:
    1.0

      void add(Product product, int quantity)
      Creates a lineItem object containing the product, it's quantity and the price multiplied by the quantity and adds it to the cart of the customer.

        public void add(Product product,
                int quantity)
        Creates a lineItem object containing the product, it's quantity and the price multiplied by the quantity and adds it to the cart of the customer.
        Parameters:
        product - the product to put into the cart.
        quantity - the quantity of the product the customer put into the cart
